column3:
『テルメ山の巨人たちが守りし古の球が
勇者の試練へと導くだろう』

周辺に棲む巨人たちが
何か鍵を握っているのだろうか…
column4:
The ancient spheres guarded by the
Mount Taran sentinels shall lead you to
the hero's trial.

Could thegiantswho inhabit the area hold
the key to unlocking the trial?

column3:
テルメ山に棲むヒノックスの三兄弟が
首にぶら下げていた球

それを各々の台座へと捧げたことで
古代の祠が出現した
column4:
The three Hinox brothers living on Mount Taran
each had an orb hanging from their neck.

Offering these orbs to the matching pedestals
caused an ancient shrine to appear.
